===Overview===
The '''Kanto Tribe ''' is a [[human]] hunter-gatherer society based in the [[Savage Land]]. They lived near an underground river.{{r|Savage Tales #8}} 

===Events===
A messenger Kanto informed Ka-Zar about the arrival of a shipment of [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] Agents in the Savage Land.{{r|Savage Tales #8}}
